comment.author: 73199923@N00

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/hpeters] You are having fun with bing! I think the pipeline was for sewage (not the water mains), hence the lack of knowledge and publicity of a wonderful structure. Out of sight, out of mind. www.sydneywater.com.au/Sustainability/OurHeritageAssets/_... On a trip to Sydney a few years ago I went for a wander across it, because of this photo, and to try to find the various Mosman Bay waterfalls. It used to be tidal well above this bridge.
